about_text: At DDC Developments, we are dedicated to transforming the construction industry with a strong commitment to environmental responsibility. By leveraging cutting- edge technologies like our modular systems, we offer innovative and sustainable solutions that redefine efficiency and performance. Our disruptive approach positions us as an industry leader, driving progress and shaping the future of construction.
modular_construction_grid: <0>Modular construction</0> with<1/> power to manufacture <2/> <0>properties</0> <3/> per day
convert_projects: We convert designs into reality through innovative the modular construction method.
modular_system_accordion: At DDC, we rely on a cutting-edge modular construction system that allows for faster execution, greater precision, and superior quality. By using prefabricated components, we streamline the building process and reduce environmental impact—transforming how real estate projects are developed across Florida.
ar_accordion: We use Augmented Reality to offer immersive project previews, allowing clients and investors to visualize spaces before construction begins. This technology improves decision-making and creates a stronger emotional connection with every property.
bim_accordion: Through BIM (Building Information Modeling), DDC guarantees project accuracy, cost control, and streamlined collaboration. This digital model centralizes architectural, structural, and MEP data—ensuring a smarter, more transparent construction process.
tokenization_accordion: We’re pioneering real estate tokenization to democratize access to investment. By converting property value into digital tokens, we make it easier for global investors to participate with transparency, liquidity, and lower entry barriers.
ddc_app_accordion: Our mobile app empowers investors to track progress, manage documents, and monitor returns—all in real-time. It’s your direct line to every DDC project, designed to make property investment simple, secure, and accessible.

danilo_dominguez.description: Our CEO, Danilo Dominguez, has been dedicating his life to better understanding how we can better connect all real estate industries. From Real Estate Brokerage to Residential & Commercial construction. For him, it's all about the clients' experiences.

danilo_dominguez_catasus.description: A veteran builder, Danilo turns strategy into flawless execution. He fine-tunes procurement, scheduling, and on-site workflows so our modular builds rise faster and safer. His hands-on leadership safeguards cost, quality, and compliance, delivering the operational excellence clients and investors expect from DDC.

israel_gonzalez.description: Israel opens new doors for DDC. With keen market insight and an investor-first mindset, he scouts opportunities, negotiates strategic partnerships, and builds pipelines that fuel our modular projects. His blend of financial acumen and relationship savvy turns prospects into long-term collaborators who share DDC’s vision.

yiseny_anzola.description: Yiseny turns interest into ownership. Grounded in Miami’s fast-moving market, she guides buyers and investors from first inquiry to closing, making every step clear and efficient. Her proactive approach and personable style ensure each transaction reflects the distinction, prestige, and quality that define DDC.

alejandro_fonticoba.description: Alejandro keeps every DDC build on track. From permitting to punch-list, he aligns architects, engineers, and trades, tracking costs and milestones so modules arrive and assemble without delays. His rigorous oversight safeguards budgets and ensures DDC’s signature quality reaches the site as designed.

alex_olivares.description: Alex is the on‑site force behind DDC’s precision builds. Drawing on deep field experience, he orchestrates crews, suppliers, and safety protocols so our modular structures rise flawlessly. His eye for detail and proactive problem‑solving keep timelines tight and quality uncompromised—delivering the craft clients expect.

javi_ferrer.description: Javi turns ideas into stories people remember. Using clear data and fresh creativity, he builds campaigns that show why DDC’s modular projects stand out. From a social-post to an investor pitch, he keeps every detail polished so clients and partners feel the distinction and quality that define DDC.

alejandra_rosas.description: Alejandra plays a key role in ensuring the financial backbone of each project runs smoothly. With deep knowledge of loan documentation and regulatory processes, she supports our clients and internal teams to streamline approvals and secure reliable financing. Her precision and dedication help bring DDC projects to life with confidence and clarity.

juan_sebastian.description: Juan ensures every real estate transaction runs smoothly from start to finish. With strong attention to detail and client coordination, he bridges the gap between contracts, timelines, and closing processes. His commitment to clarity and execution makes him a key player in delivering seamless deals at DDC.

stephanie_parra.description: Stephanie is the link between our clients and the full execution of every project. As Account Manager, she ensures communication is fluid, expectations are clear, and every step of the process is aligned with our client’s goals. Her proactive approach and strategic mindset help strengthen long-term relationships and guarantee satisfaction at every stage.

lorena_ardila.description: Lorena leads the strategic coordination of our marketing efforts, ensuring every campaign aligns with DDC’s vision and brand identity. With a sharp eye for planning and a deep understanding of audience dynamics, she transforms ideas into structured actions that drive visibility, positioning, and growth. Her work connects every message with purpose.

wilfredo_alvarado.description: Wilfredo turns concepts into immersive realities. As the mind behind DDC’s photorealistic renders, augmented-reality previews, and graphic identity, he lets clients walk through a project—feel its light, materials, and flow—long before construction begins, elevating every decision with clarity, beauty, and technical precision.

Villa_Tortuga.description: Contemporary elegance meets tropical serenity. This waterfront residence blends minimalist interiors with warm textures, expansive windows, and seamless outdoor living—designed to elevate comfort, light, and luxury under the Florida sun.

Villa_Anzola.description: A bespoke architectural retreat in Lehigh Acres, Florida. This refined tropical home pairs natural textures with contemporary lines and generous outdoor living, offering an exclusive experience where every detail is crafted for distinction, comfort, and timeless sophistication.

Villa_Maria.description: A serene tropical modern retreat in Lehigh Acres. Villa Maria blends natural textures, warm wood accents, and matte black architecture with lush outdoor living around a private pool. Refined interiors, a chef kitchen, spa like baths, and a pergola lounge deliver timeless comfort and quiet sophistication.

Villa_Dorticos.description: A waterfront retreat in Punta Gorda where bold geometry meets organic softness. A dark and elegant exterior pairs with warm wood and lush greenery, opening to expansive layouts with double height light, warm tones, and curated illumination. Terraced gardens, a pool terrace, and a private dock create a seamless connection to nature, delivering refined comfort and timeless sophistication.

Villa_Oceania.description: A waterfront tropical modern residence in Punta Gorda. Villa Oceania pairs sculpted rooflines, matte dark stucco, and warm wood with generous glass and lush gardens, opening to elegant interiors with soft lighting, a chef kitchen, and spa baths. A long waterfront terrace with pool, lounge areas, and a dock frames sweeping water views and delivers a calm, refined lifestyle with timeless sophistication.

Villa_Oasis.description: A waterfront tropical modern residence in Florida. Dark stucco and warm wood pair with generous glass and clean roof lines, opening to serene interiors with an open kitchen, spa baths, and curated lighting. A pool terrace, lounge deck, and a private dock deliver calm living with timeless sophistication.

Villa_Nacho.description: A tropical modern residence in Lehigh Acres. Villa Nacho blends matte dark stucco, warm wood screens, and crisp geometry with lush landscaping. Bright interiors with clerestory light, an open chef kitchen, and spa baths flow to a private pool terrace, delivering refined comfort, privacy, and timeless sophistication.

Villa_Valeria.description: A contemporary sanctuary in Miami where refined minimalism meets organic warmth. Clean geometry, textured stucco, and vertical wood screens frame light filled interiors that flow to a private courtyard with pool, pergola lounge, and garden. Calm palettes, curated lighting, and crafted details elevate daily living and create a timeless sense of harmony.

Villa_Barranquilla.description: A contemporary retreat in Miami that pairs textured stucco, vertical wood screens, and generous glass with lush greenery. Bold lines and warm natural tones shape calm interiors where open layouts, crafted millwork, and soft lighting flow to a private patio with pool and lounge. The result is refined comfort and modern elegance in perfect balance.

Villa_Santa_Marta.description: A modern sanctuary in Miami that blends bold geometry with natural warmth. A concrete facade with wood screens sits within lush gardens and generous glazing. Inside, open spaces with marble finishes and natural wood tones gather daylight and flow to a private pool deck and an upper terrace, delivering refined comfort, function, and a calm connection to nature.

Villa_Cartagena.description: A contemporary refuge in Miami that unites refined architecture with tropical nature. A tall glass volume wrapped in warm wood screens anchors the facade, bringing lush greenery into calm, light filled interiors. Open living areas with a chef kitchen and spa baths flow to a private garden with pool and lounge, delivering a serene and sophisticated way of life.

Villa_Guajira.description: Villa Guajira is a modern duplex in Miami, offering clean lines, warm textures, and tropical landscaping. Its design blends indoor-outdoor living with private pools, luxurious interiors, and a serene, contemporary ambiance. Perfect for elegant urban lifestyles.

Villa_Ochoa.description: Villa Ochoa pairs minimalist architecture with natural warmth. A low, linear façade in stone-gray stucco and vertical wood screens sits within lush greenery, while expansive glazing and clerestory windows bathe the interiors in soft Florida light. Inside, an open plan wrapped in creamy plaster, marble accents, and custom millwork drifts out to the covered terrace, pool, and private dock—an effortless balance of modern design and serene living.

Villa_Don_Quixote.description: Villa Don Quixote blends modern elegance with a serene outdoor retreat. A bold façade of clean lines and warm, earthy textures pairs with lush greenery. Inside, open layouts and soft, layered lighting create effortless comfort, while the poolside lounge invites relaxation—striking a refined balance between sophistication and tranquility.

Villa_Atlantico.description: This modern home harmonizes with its natural surroundings through a minimalist exterior, clean lines, and earthy tones. Wooden accents and dark textures add elegance while blending with the lush greenery. Inside, neutral palettes, natural materials like wood and stone, and an open-plan layout maximize light and comfort. Floor-to-ceiling curtains and indoor greenery enhance the connection to nature, creating a tranquil and balanced space for relaxation.

Villa_Nukes.description: A modern sanctuary in Lehigh Acres that pairs calm sophistication with natural elegance. Clean geometry, warm woods, and an earthy palette frame bright, open-plan living that flows to a sunlit pool terrace. With four bedrooms, three baths, and lush privacy, it’s designed for effortless indoor-outdoor relaxation.

Villa_Esplanade.description: A serene, single-story residence that pairs coastal calm with contemporary minimalism. Rhythmic wood screens, low horizontal lines, and generous glazing frame sculpted gardens and soften the façade. Inside, a clerestory-lit great room centers a chef’s kitchen with a monolithic island, while spa-like suites feature rich stone and warm veneers. Seamless indoor-outdoor flow leads to landscaped terraces and pool—elegance made effortless.

Villa_Penate.description: Villa Penate is a refined one-story residence that balances crisp geometry with warm, tactile finishes. A moody façade with wood accents and expansive glazing leads to light-filled interiors chef’s kitchen, lofted living, and spa suites that unfold to a pool terrace and waterfront dock, creating seamless, resort-style indoor–outdoor living.

Villa_Victor.description: Villa Victor blends sleek architecture with tropical serenity. Its dark exterior contrasts with warm wood accents, creating a bold, modern look. Inside, open living spaces and natural light define a refined lifestyle, while the private pool deck offers an inviting escape—designed for both relaxation and entertaining.

Villa_Tortuga.description: Villa Tortuga pairs a low, modern profile with warm wood accents and soft lighting, set among palms for a relaxed streetscape. Inside, airy rooms and a lofty kitchen–dining space use pale oak, stone, and matte black details for quiet sophistication, while calm bedrooms and a spa-like bath open to a pool terrace made for easy coastal living.

1.title: Market analysis
1.description: We validate demand, pricing, and absorption in the target area, and review zoning, utilities, and site risks. The outcome is a clear go/no-go with a preliminary schedule and cost window.

2.title: Financial & Loan Management
2.description: We assemble the lender package, secure terms with regional banks, and coordinate appraisal and closing. During the build, we manage draw schedules, inspections, and compliance so funds flow on time.

3.title: Architectural project
3.description: We develop the design aligned to the panelized steel system—walls, roof, and floor—defining service paths, openings, and connection details. You receive permit-ready plans, panel schedules, and a crane/assembly plan.

4.title: Modular construction (3-4 months)
4.description: Panels are fabricated with Florida partners, labeled for traceability, and delivered to site for a repeatable assembly sequence: layout → first lift → lock & align → close-in. Quality checks are documented at each stage until punchlist close-out.

5.title: Pre-sale & exclusive sales
5.description: With Tsalach Real Estate, we set the go-to-market plan—positioning, pricing, and launch calendar—then manage leads, reservations, and closings. Buyers get clear documentation and timelines from the first contact to handover.
